company.name: VistaView Realty Services
company.subtitle: World's #1 Real Estate Intelligence & Virtual Experience Platform

mission: To revolutionize real estate through AI-powered virtual experiences, connecting buyers, sellers, vendors, and builders in one seamless platform.

team.name: Vamsi Velicheti
team.bio: Vamsi is a visionary entrepreneur with over 15 years of experience in technology and real estate. He founded VistaView with the mission to democratize property discovery through cutting-edge AI and virtual reality. Under his leadership, VistaView has grown to serve thousands of users across multiple markets.
team.voice_intro: Meet Vamsi Velicheti, our Founder and CEO. With 15 years of experience in tech and real estate, Vamsi created VistaView to make property discovery as easy as shopping on Amazon!

team.name: Vikram
team.bio: Vikram leads VistaView's technology initiatives, bringing deep expertise in AI, machine learning, and scalable architecture. His innovations power our intelligent property matching system, voice AI, and the self-learning algorithms that make Mr. V smarter every day.
team.voice_intro: This is Vikram, our Co-Founder and CTO. He's the genius behind our AI systems, including me, Mr. V! His expertise in machine learning makes our property matching incredibly smart.

team.name: Sunita
team.bio: Sunita ensures operational excellence across all VistaView services. Her background in real estate operations and customer experience shapes our user-first approach. She oversees vendor relationships, quality assurance, and ensures every user interaction exceeds expectations.
team.voice_intro: And here's Sunita, our Co-Founder and COO. She makes sure everything runs smoothly and that every user has an amazing experience!

values.name: Innovation First
values.description: We push boundaries with AI and VR
